Keywords: Armor , Deity , Future , Horsemen , Past , Ruler , Warrior
Real Name: En Sabah Nur
Special Powers
THE HOUR OF YOUR GLORY IS AT HAND, MY HORSEMEN: The bystanders on this card are "Horsemen Bystanders" and have [MAX 1] and a point value of 5. // At the beginning of the game, you may generate a Horsemen bystander. When Apocalypse crosses a starting line, after resolutions you may generate a Horsemen bystander.
EN SABAH NUR: Leadership, Mastermind, Shape Change. When Apocalypse uses Leadership and succeeds, you may instead generate a Horsemen bystander. // When Apocalypse uses Mastermind, friendly characters within range are considered to be adjacent.
GO FORTH, MY HORSEMEN: Charge, Stealth. // POWER: Choose one effect: *Place all of Apocalypse's Horsemen bystanders on the map adjacent to him. *Generate a Horsemen bystander.
ONLY THE STRONG SURVIVE: Combat Reflexes, Energy Shield/Deflection. // Once per turn, when Apocalypse uses Mastermind and chooses a Horsemen bystander, the chosen character may be given an action token instead of taking damage.
EONS OF SCHEMING: Empower, Enhancement, Probability Control.
Linked Units

Figure Errata
Changed: GO FORTH, MY HORSEMEN & THE HOUR OF YOUR GLORY IS AT HAND, MY HORSEMEN

Comments
August 24, 2022
Red and Blue Rocks
Played him last night. The teams I faced weren't exactly up to parr, so he kinda wrecked. The last game I faced the new Bat/Cat duo, and it looked like I was gonna fail as I kept missing attacks and Leadership rolls. Thankfully my Shape Change kept me alive against some would be penetrating attacks. When I got to the Toughness clicks I brought in Famine to Poison-Outwit and started to turn the tide. That damage special was a godsend as I easily started taking out the support with Archangel and getting to reroll. When it came down to Bat and Cat there was no conceivable way they could damage him as the speed special just allowed my to keep creating Mastermind fodder. Yeah, that speed special is his ace in the hole. I did not expect that to be as broken as it is. He still needs to do some damage before reaching it.
August 7, 2022
bam
That Mastermind penalizing with action tokens rather than damage & how easy it is to generate new bystanders means that those bystanders need to be KOed before even dreaming you can damage this guy. ^#%$ing wild
